content: American researchers have developed an AI system to automatically generate sentences for the purpose of composing poems! The system was trained using a text collection from approximately 12,000 e-books (around 80 million sentences), mostly about fiction.
translations: ita:Ricercatori americani hanno sviluppato un sistema di intelligenza artificiale per generare automaticamente frasi allo sc
